                     @Nonnull
                     java.lang.String username,
                     @Nonnull
                     java.lang.String password)
        Constructs a new Database.
        Parameters:
        host - the url or IP Address to which the host is located
        port - the port that's used to access the server
        database - the name of the accessing database
        username - the name of an active user on the server
        password - the password for the active user
